string.value: Not only did you defeat the monster from another dimension, but you helped us fix the Ludibrium Clocktower. I can't thank you enough for all your hard work. Thanks to you, everything is all right. Hope you have a great time here in Ludibrium!

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh! You're the one that met up with our Roly-Polies in Eos Tower for me! How can I help you? Huh? Haha, of course, I did not forget the lunch box my daughter made for me. I'm just waiting for lunch so I can eat it! I'll see you around!

string.value: Refining Expert

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't you want to make something? It's a piece of cake for me!

string.value: Green Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: As long as we're here, everything will be fine!

string.name: n1
string.value: Did we miss our takeoff...?

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm here on a very important mission given to me by the Omega Sector. It's very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run right now.

string.name: d1
string.value: The Roswell Field is prone to aliens appearances, so this place is under constant watch. The attack is still on, so I suggest you and others not get too comfortable here. I'll have to head back to the Sector for some more work, so I'll see you around!

string.name: name
string.value: Black Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: Pink Mesoranger is ALWAYS late... we can't be at 100% strength unless all 5 of us are here.

string.name: n1
string.value: Nothing scares us when all 5 of us are together!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello! I'm #b#p2040018##k, in charge of a mission to prevent the aliens from invading this place. It seems like they have been acting up more lately. It's very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run back to the Omega Sector for safety.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me get rid of #b#o4230116##k here at the Coolan Field. It feels good to find someone like you here at a place where dangerous aliens are a common sight. I'm still investigating the mastermind behind these aliens. I'm going up against yet another alien, so it's not easy...

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our hospital! Your face looks terrrible. Need my help?

string.value: Hey! You're the one that cleaned out Eos Tower for me! How have you been? I'm thrilled the number of monsters has decreased, and they aren't as wild as they were before. I really appreciate all your hard work. Oh well, hope you have a great day in Ludibrium!

string.value: Hey, there! How's it going?

string.name: d1
string.value: Hello! Thanks to you, my dad got his appetite back. He really enjoys it. How can I help you today? Oh no! You shouldn't enter this place with your shoes on! I cleaned up this place just now, you know! If you don't have much else to do, then please come back some other time!

string.name: name
string.value: Mrs. Claus

string.name: n0
string.value: Where is my husband?

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you believe in Santa Claus?

string.name: d0
string.value: Need any help?

string.name: d1
string.value: Nobody's sewing skills are on par with mine! Not even close!

string.name: d0
string.value: The outside world is so much better than what I imagined in my egg!

string.name: d1
string.value: Master, if I'm by your side, I'll go anywhere. Anywhere!
Heh, I can defeat a pig with a single toenail! I am a dragon, you know.
I'm so weak from hunger, I couldn't even defeat a pig. The pig would probably end up eating me... I feel so weak...
Look for the word 'impossible' in the dictionary and you'll see a picture of a Dragon eating grass. I refuse to eat it. It's gross! Bleh!
Ugh... My stomach... I feel sick.
Dad probably knows something that can help us! Huh? It's weird that I call him Dad? But what else would I call him? Your dad is my dad, Master.
The Dairy Cow might be a little scary... Just saying...
Ah, so full. Hmm, didn't Dad say he wanted to tell us something?
Yeah, that explanation was a little wordy. To sum it up, you and I share the same destiny.
Ha! Strange Pigs aren't so different from normal Pigs. I can defeat them with one wing tied behind my back.
Haha, I defeated the Strange Pigs! I'm awesome! We better go tell Dad!
So this is what a town looks like. Wow! So many people... And they're all so busy!
So this is what helping people is all about!
Let's help people who are in trouble! I'm sure this town is full of folk who need help.
Train! Train! Traaain! Choo choo! Let's train, Master!
Power B. Fore, from the Hill East of Henesys... Strange name...
Eh, that Power B. Fore guy is kind of a weirdo.
Cynical Orange Mushrooms! Cynical Orange Mushrooms! What does 'cynical' mean anyway?
Master, I'm getting booored...
What kind of oddball would raise Spores? Seriously...
Ribbon Pigs? Bah! They'll topple to the ground if I just poke them with my pinky.
You and I are heroes, Master! What? That deed wasn't significant enough to make us heroes? Psh, big or small, it's the thought that counts. Let's just call ourselves heroes!
Hey, we saw some crying Blue Mushrooms, remember? I thought they were just being overly emotional, but I suppose that's not the case...
Whoa, this puppet has some seriously bad mojo. You feel it?
Luke said he'd need our help when we reach Lv. 20.
A guard isn't as impressive as a hero, but it's still an important job. Of course, I'd love to do it. Besides, who says we can't be both?
Argh! I hate to leave things hanging. I need closure. I won't be able to rest until we catch the culprit. Nella better contact us soon!
Of course I'm curious about me, but I'm more curious about my race. Where are all the other dragons?
Onyx Dragons... Where are they? They have to be around somewhere...
A talking puppet! How bizarre! What? It's bizarre to hear a dragon talk? No, it's not. You're silly!
I'm so glad we cleared up Sabitrama's misunderstanding. Only morons jump to conclusions. What do you mean I do it all the time?
Hmm, that puppet is actually very nice. I didn't expect that.
The folks in your hometown don't know you very well, Master. Not nearly as well as I do. It's kind of sad...
Phew, I'm so glad everything turned out okay. What a relief!
That door with the puppet on it is a big problem. What can we do? Hmm...
Heheheh. That was remarkably heroic, if I do say so myself.
A secret organization of people who do good deeds? Awesome! I'll be like one of those superheroes that hide their identities. Bat-Mir! Mir-verine! IronMir! Oooh, I really want to join!
This organization is truly secretive. It's hard to join, because it's so selective!
Since I gave you one of my precious scales, we'd better find out more about Onyx Dragons.
Onyx Dragons are extinct...? But why? How?
No. How can Onyx Dragons be extinct when I'm right here? Uh-uh. There have to be other Onyx Dragons somewhere!
Yay, we're in! We're in! We're part of the secret organization!
This secret organization is more secretive than I imagined... What's the point of being so secretive when you're just helping other people?
A clue about Onyx Dragons? Let's ask, Master! Right now!
Go, go, go! To Lith Harbor! To John! He might know something about my race!
I can't wait to find others like me!
Another super secret mission from a super secret organization...
Hmm, how is that strange creature, Shammos, related to the secret organization? I can't figure it out.
Let's rush to that island where the dragons live, Master!
At least now I know there's another dragon out there. I can wait longer if I have to. We'll be reunited someday. I just know it.
Ah, so the mystery of the secret organization is revealed! Sort of... But there's still so much I don't understand.
I've got a bad feeling about this mission. Is it all in my head?
What the... It's our fourth mission and we're still only temporary members?
Something... Something just isn't right...
What in the world just happened?! I don't understand what's going on...
That Dragon talked to me! I'm sure of it!
Master, I wasn't able to look into his memory. Tell me! Tell me!
Those Black Wings... They tricked us! They destroyed my species! I will never forgive them...

string.name: name
string.value: Full Moon

string.name: n0
string.value: Ugh... Is this how the story of Christopher the brilliant explorer ends?

string.name: d0
string.value: *Huff puff.* Is anyone out there? Help. I need someone to help a lost yet nonetheless brilliant explorer. Anyone?

string.value: An old friend of mine is suddenly nowhere to be found... I wonder how she's doing these days...

string.name: n1
string.value: I've been investigating around town lately and found some very interesting facts in the process...

string.name: d0

string.value: Monsters have been getting much more ferocious lately. It's gotten to the point where I am worried about getting killed out there. I used to go hunt down a number of yetis a day, but those days are now over. I'm old.

string.value: Monsters have been getting much more ferocious lately. It's gotten to the point where I am worried about getting killed out there. I used to go hunt down a number of yetis a day, but those days are now over. I'm old.

string.value: Did you get #b#t4031049##k to #b#p2020003##k? Do I need anything? Well, not for now. But come see me later, all right?

string.value: This is a strange place. It looks like an abandoned tower. Oh, I'm #b#p2030002##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We got in an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.

string.name: d1
string.value: This is a strange place. It looks like an abandoned tower. Oh, I'm #b#p2030002##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We got in an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.

string.name: d1

string.value: Hey, what's going on? Have you tried using the stuff I gave you the other day? That item had some experimental elements to it, and therefore it's a little dangerous, but it was fun making something I've always wanted to make. I have to get back to work now!

string.value: Rocky the Repairman

string.name: n0
string.value: Why does this keep breaking down?

string.name: d0
string.value: It's broken again... And I just fixed this not too long ago! Who did this?! If only I could get my hands on whoever's responsible for this... ARRGH!

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh no, it must be the monsters again. As soon as I fix this, they come rushing back and break it again. Hey, how long have you been there? Thanks to the parts you got me, I've been fixing machines here and there, but they seem to break every other day, so I have no time to rest. I gotta go! Bye!

string.name: d1

string.name: s0

string.name: s1

string.name: d1

string.value: Are you interested in becoming a free person?

string.name: s1
string.value: Hey you! You seem...different.

string.name: d0
string.value: Not everyone can become free!

string.name: d1
string.value: A free spirit... That's who you are now.

string.value: 4th Job - Thief Instructor

string.name: s0

string.name: s1

string.name: d0
string.value: Have you really thought about it deeply?

string.name: d1
string.value: True darkness coexists with light. Please remember that.

string.value: 4th Job - Pirate Instructor

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you want the freedom and might of the seas?

string.name: n1

string.name: d0
string.value: Have you come to find true power?

string.name: d1
string.value: You have earned true power.

string.name: s1

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Do

string.name: func
string.value: Potion Creator

string.name: s0
string.value: Hey, aren't you the one who's supposed to go get the herbs? Eh?

string.name: s1
string.value: Eh? How come you all look similar? Aren't you the one? Eh?

string.name: d0
string.value: Back in the day, Mr. Do was respected for his intellect. Everyone knew him, the genius Mr. Do of Mu Lung!

string.name: d1
string.value: Well, my master can be extremely stubborn sometimes. He just won't admit that studying herbs will only take him so far. Studying alchemy wouldn't be such a bad idea...

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Sang

string.name: n0
string.value: My Taoist beliefs enable me to make the best possible medicine.

string.name: n1
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Ku's doing these days... I haven't seen my friend in a while.

string.name: d0
string.value: This peach isn't just a fruit; it's a medicinal ingredient.

string.name: d1
string.value: Once the peaches start growing, feel free to pick a couple. Good things are meant to be shared.

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Soo

string.name: n0
string.value: The owner of the Peach Farm is the great Tae Sang!

string.name: n1
string.value: My name's Tae Soo, and I've been hired recently to protect this place. Nice to meet you!

string.name: d0
string.value: Ahhh... Those darn Peach Monkeys are so fast, I can't keep up with them! Not only that, but they keep throwing our precious Peaches away! And the Peach Tree seems to be dying... Argh, what should I do?

string.name: d1
string.value: Thanks to that medicine, the Peach Trees seem to be growing as if the sky's the limit! Don't you think I deserve a bonus from Tae Sang?

string.name: name
string.value: Master Goblin

string.name: n0
string.value: Ho ho ho ho!

string.name: n1
string.value: Call me the King of Sage Cats! Ho ho ho!

string.name: d0
string.value: The King of Sage Cats is indeed a lover of peace. I do not wish to fight Mu Lung nor Do Gong, and I believe in peace and love more than anything else! Ho ho ho!

string.name: d1
string.value: Ho ho ho... Now that Do Gong is poisoned, no one in Mu Lung will be able to interfere with my spells! Pretty soon, I can call Mu Lung MY KIND OF TOWN! HOHOHO!

string.name: name
string.value: So Gong

string.name: n0
string.value: You think you can enter Mu Lung Dojo with your skills?

string.name: n1
string.value: My master is the world's greatest! Don't mess around!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello, newbie. My name is So Gong. I train here at Mu Lung Dojo.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hello, newbie. My name is So Gong. I train here at Mu Lung Dojo.

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Ku

string.name: n0
string.value: Huh... lately there have been a number of thieves stealing our herbs.

string.name: n1
string.value: I need to send these herbs to Tae Sang fast...

string.name: d0
string.value: Growing herbs takes a lot of time and effort.

string.name: d1
string.value: Even Herb Town isn't as quiet as it used to be.

string.name: name
string.value: Captain Hwang

string.name: n0
string.value: I am in charge of all freight heading to Mu Lung.

string.name: n1
string.value: Apparently there's a Pirate Lair just past the herb field...

string.name: d0
string.value: Hmmm... Where did I put that sword I used to use back in the day? I wonder if I can fight as well as I used to... In order to protect this town, I may have no choice but to fight those evil Red-Nosed Pirates.

string.name: d1
string.value: Lord Pirate may be powerful, and so are its disciples, but I will do whatever it takes to protect this beautiful town!

string.name: name
string.value: So Won

string.name: func
string.value: Armor Seller

string.name: s0
string.value: How about these shields? Don't they look awesome?

string.name: s2
string.value: In this world of trouble, the only thing that can help you is this trusty set of armor.

string.name: s1
string.value: Even the pirates can't do anything against these shields!

string.name: name
string.value: Lan Ming

string.name: s0
string.value: Tired? Worn out? In need of a boost?

string.name: s1
string.value: These potions are made from the finest ingredients. These are perfect for restoring your health!

string.name: n1
string.value: Is Wu Yang doing all right? I really hope Lord Pirate isn't laying its filthy hands on him.

string.name: d0
string.value: I sincerely hope Wu Yang is all right.

string.name: d1
string.value: Bellflowers should have been taught to battle, too. It's good to live in peace, but it's disheartening to know that I am not strong enough to protect myself when the threat of violence comes my way.

string.name: n0
string.value: Since when did we Bellflowers become pirates...?

string.name: name
string.value: Wu Yang

string.name: n0
string.value: Thank you so much for saving me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Finally the Bellflowers can escape the grasp of Lord Pirate.

string.name: n1
string.value: Is Wu Yang doing all right? I really hope Lord Pirate isn't laying its filthy hands on him.

string.name: d0
string.value: I sincerely hope Wu Yang is all right.

string.value: Since when did we Bellflowers become pirates...?

string.value: For Checking

string.value: Item Market

string.name: n0
string.value: You need to be careful in treating Lidium.

string.name: n1
string.value: Lidium is strong, but it's a beautiful mineral. Can you see this luster?

string.name: d0
string.value: To treat Lidium is difficult. Even in Ariant, there aren't many skilled craftsmen...

string.name: d1
string.value: Even though Sirin is careless, she's clever and kind. Sometimes people misunderstand her feelings for Vivid, but she does what she has to.

string.name: func
string.value: Weapon Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you want to be stronger? Why don't you get a new weapon?

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you want to buy a new weapon? Please look around.

string.name: func
string.value: Armor Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want clothes made from soft silk, look around here!

string.name: n1
string.value: If you like it, try it out. I'll give you a discount.

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't bother me. Just buy what you want and go.

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't you tired? How about drinking a glass of cool potion?

string.name: func
string.value: General Goods Dealer

string.name: s0
string.value: I am working part-time here to help my family.

string.name: s1
string.value: I'm only part-time, but I do good work! Trust me!

string.name: func
string.value: Hair Salon Assistant

string.name: func
string.value: Hair Salon Director

string.name: s0
string.value: It's important to keep the hottest hairstyles here in the desert!

string.name: s1
string.value: Hm... If you want a new hair style, consult me about it.

string.name: s0
string.value: The place is known for its sun tanning.

string.name: s1
string.value: The queen visits me very often, too.

string.name: func
string.value: Skin Care Expert

string.name: s0
string.value: Anyone who's rich can be a model here.

string.name: s1
string.value: I've trimmed many a famous face in this city.

string.name: func
string.value: Plastic Surgery Director

string.name: s0
string.value: Want to give it a shot? Plastic surgery, I mean.

string.name: s1
string.value: I don't have experience, but just trust me.

string.name: func
string.value: Plastic Surgery Doctor

string.name: n0
string.value: What a gorgeous day!

string.name: n1
string.value: Press the Alt key to jump.

string.name: n2
string.value: Press the arrow keys to move.

string.name: s2
string.value: How's is going?

string.name: b0
string.value: Whoa. You look kind of lost.

string.name: c0
string.value: Argh, my beautiful skin...

string.name: d0
string.value: You must be new! Allow me to help. To move, use the #bleft and right arrows#k. To jump, press the #bAlt#k key. To speak to NPCs, simply click on them. Easy, right? Oh, sometimes you'll have to climb ladders or ropes. To do so, simply use the #bup arrow#k next to the object you want to climb!

string.name: d1
string.value: Now I can check my skin. Whew! It looks just fine.

string.name: n0
string.value: I'll show you a great dance.

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you want to know about the 'Sand Bandits?' Look into it for yourself.

string.name: d0
string.value: Just dancing well is not enough for me. I want to do a marvelous, brilliant dance!

string.name: d1
string.value: The queen only cares about jewelry. She knows nothing about dance even though everyone in Ariant thinks dancing is important.

string.name: n0
string.value: I want to see my sister.

string.name: n1
string.value: I am afraid of the queen's face.

string.name: d0
string.value: I really miss my sister. Why did the queen take her? She's innocent...

string.name: d1
string.value: Unless the queen releases my sister... I'll join the Sand Bandits and rescue her.

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't speak to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Why do you keep staring at me?

string.name: d0
string.value: Stay away from me, or risk the consequences.

string.name: d1
string.value: Is it faster to assassinate the queen than to steal her treasure? If my leader lets me, I will assassinate her...

string.name: n0
string.value: ...What are you staring at?

string.name: n1
string.value: Sand can't be scattered without wind.

string.name: d0
string.value: I don't have the time to talk to you... In fact, I am not as free as you think.

string.name: d1
string.value: The 'Sand Bandits' are still weak. What else do we need to be stronger...?

string.name: n0
string.value: It is my honor to protect the palace.

string.name: n1
string.value: Hm... Do you have a Lidium gemstone?

string.name: d0
string.value: A beard is a symbol of masculinity! There isn't another beard as nice as mine!

string.name: d1
string.value: Don't underestimate us guardians! It's a great honor to protect entrance of the palace! I'd bet my beard on it!

string.name: n0
string.value: Desert people are too careful.

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to study every culture in the world!

string.name: d0
string.value: Isn't this turban cool? It seems to make me understand Ariant culture well.

string.name: d1
string.value: Ariant is the most interesting place I have been ever. I guess I can write interesting stories about this territory.

string.name: name
string.value: Le Petit Prince

string.name: n0
string.value: I cannot see the stars.

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to make friends.

string.name: d0
string.value: I don't know what to do when Rose is upset.

string.name: d1
string.value: I'm really glad to have a friend. The barren desert looks beautiful because of you.

string.name: n0
string.value: Are there no more beautiful jewels?

string.name: n1
string.value: Only dazzling beauty satisfies me.

string.name: d0
string.value: Those desert people are filthy. The only good thing about them is their ability to work Lidium.

string.name: d1
string.value: I need more beautiful, more precious, more special jewelry filled with magical power!

string.name: n0
string.value: Once upon a time...

string.name: n1
string.value: And Aladdin rubbed the magic lamp...

string.name: d0
string.value: I wonder how Jiyur has been... What if Jiyur is hurt? Even though the Sand Bandits protect him.

string.name: d1
string.value: The heroes of old were brave. I see that same brilliant bravery in you.

string.name: name
string.value: Abdullah VIII

string.name: n0
string.value: How irritating. Queen... Can you act in place of the king...? Do whatever you want...

string.name: n1
string.value: Hmm... Hmm...

string.name: d0
string.value: It is strange to always be so tired. It is irritating to even open my eyes... When did I get like this?

string.name: d1
string.value: Huge desert... Barren but rich desert... They'll be fine without their king.

string.name: n0
string.value: Hm... Do you have business here?

string.name: n1
string.value: You'd better be careful of what you say... It's dangerous here...

string.name: d0
string.value: Not just anyone can join the Sand Bandits. We don't look kindly on reckless initiates.

string.name: d1
string.value: We can't rest until Ariant is free.

string.name: n0
string.value: Huh! The queen is blinded by greed... It might be dangerous to say things like that.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you're not with us, leave! It's too dangerous for you here.

string.name: d0
string.value: Sh! Be quiet! What if a guardian notices you?

string.name: d1
string.value: Though it's in the desert, Ariant was once rich thanks to Lidium... This is all the queen's fault.

string.name: name
string.value: Strange Guy

string.name: n0
string.value: Ariant is a really good place to live... Hohoho!

string.name: n1
string.value: I need to gather more comrades.

string.name: d0
string.value: How can I steal the queen's treasure...

string.name: d1
string.value: Whoever bothers the queen is good with us.

string.name: n0
string.value: It's difficult to get Ellinia's direct import order sheet...

string.name: n1
string.value: I can get anything you want, even if you can't get it in Ariant.

string.name: d0
string.value: I often visit Ariant for trade. I came here for trade as well. Anyway, it is time to see the queen's guardian.

string.name: d1
string.value: It is good to trade with the queen. She always buys jewelry, no matter how expensive. She has been looking for rare jewelry more and more.

string.name: func
string.value: Royal Guard Captain

string.name: n0
string.value: Want to start the Ariant Coliseum Challenge? Let me know when you're ready.

string.name: n1
string.value: You look faster and more powerful than everyone else here!

string.name: d0
string.value: The Ariant Coliseum Challenge! Join this great competition of speed, power, and decision-making! Winning this is the ultimate honor for any warrior!

string.name: d1
string.value: The Ariant Coliseum Challenge! Join this great competition of speed, power, and decision-making! Winning this is the ultimate honor for any warrior!

string.name: n0
string.value: Give me...the ... jewel!

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow...this jewel is made from scratch? The people at Magatia are actually a bit more useful than I thought!

string.value: Queen's Cabinet

string.name: func
string.value: Item Maker

string.name: s0
string.value: Hmmm... My eyes have gone bad. Where are the pliers?

string.name: s1
string.value: This jewel is worthless. Look at that scratch.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hmm... Let me see...

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh oh oh, careful there! Phew... That could have been bad. Really bad.

string.name: func
string.value: Item Maker

string.name: s0
string.value: Don't think hammers are the only way to make items! Alchemy is just as effective!

string.name: s1
string.value: Utilize the power of alchemy, and your item will turn out that much nicer!

string.name: d0
string.value: Welcome to my lab! Just make sure not to drop anything.

string.name: d1
string.value: You can always look around, as long as you can keep quiet.

string.name: func
string.value: Zenumist President

string.name: n0
string.value: True Alchemy is associated with magical power.

string.name: n1
string.value: This place is Zenumist, for alchemists seeking pure alchemy.

string.name: d0
string.value: Tradition yields great power. Since the Black Magician Age, only Zenumist have kept developing alchemy.

string.name: d1
string.value: Alchemy and alchemist... Both are important. But more important than that is Magatia's tolerance of us. I must protect the honor of Magatia.

string.name: func
string.value: Alcadno President

string.name: n0
string.value: It is foolish to judge them by their looks.

string.name: n1
string.value: Pure alchemy has its limits. If you want to exceed your limits, join Alcadno.

string.name: d0
string.value: Zenumist... I know what they say. They don't like merging life energy with machines. They're simply afraid! Seeking pure alchemy won't lead to the future.

string.name: d1
string.value: Nobody knows what's more important yet. Who knows which of us is right? Who knows how to choose between a correct lie and a foolish truth...?

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. De Lang

string.name: d0
string.value: Isn't it wrong...?

string.name: d1
string.value: This experiment might be wrong... But I can't give up. For her and Keeny.

string.name: name
string.value: Humanoid A

string.name: n0
string.value: I wish to smell a flower at least once...

string.name: n1
string.value: Where are you from? Not from a beaker, are you...?

string.name: d0
string.value: Are my emotions real? Or just an illusion caused by mechanical error?

string.name: d1
string.value: I want to be human... With a warm heart... Then... I can hold her hands.

string.name: n0
string.value: Isn't it so beautiful? Even though it's animated by alchemy.

string.name: n1
string.value: It is lucky for use to have Keeny. How bad it would be without Keeny...

string.name: d0
string.value: Even though alchemists and fairies have antipathy for each other, I can remain in this town because the Zenumist president has been protecting us.

string.name: d1
string.value: I used to live in Orbis. It was pleasant to walk in cloud park with my brother.

string.name: n0
string.value: Keeny loves learning Alchemy!

string.name: n1
string.value: *Cough!* Ah... I can't stop coughing...

string.name: d0
string.value: Almost all Magatians are alchemists. Everyone concentrates on alchemy. So... Magatia is always quiet.

string.name: d1
string.value: Keeny like Humanoid! I can feel warmth from Humanoid A's eyes.

string.name: d0
string.value: *Gulp* Why are there only Ghosts around here...?

string.name: d1
string.value: Because I've been in the laboratory for a long time, I got to know many people. But they don't know me.

string.name: name
string.value: Han the Broker

string.name: n0
string.value: Deal secretly and clearly.

string.name: n1
string.value: For the right price, I'll get you whatever you want.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hm... Don't doubt me just because I'm a back street broker. I deal in trust... And I keep up my credit.

string.name: d1
string.value: I've been in Magatia for a while... I know everything that has happened in Magatia except for that case.

string.name: n0
string.value: The magical formula to make the core is so difficult.

string.name: n1
string.value: Why does Alcadno stick to machines like that?

string.name: d0
string.value: Make your position clear! Are you Zenumist or Alcadno?

string.name: d1
string.value: Not everything can be justified. Machines can never be human.

string.name: n0
string.value: Did you know that elixir's main ingredient is the eye of a Curse Eye?

string.name: n1
string.value: Only the Zenumists are real alchemists, but... They are too conservative and boring.

string.name: d0
string.value: Alcadno certainly don't count... Heheheh... Fools cannot see the important things...

string.name: d1
string.value: The Zenumists' studies are respectable... But it is too difficult to be used by everyone... Compared with Zenumist, Alcadno is more useful... Why doesn't Zenumist want to admit this?

string.name: d0
string.value: Life is a learning process, or so I was told. Do you think cleaning is part of that learning?

string.name: d1
string.value: Life is a learning process, or so I was told. Do you think cleaning is part of that learning?

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't run around in the temple. You'll get a scolding!

string.name: n1
string.value: When will big brother and master return?

string.name: func
string.value: Golden Temple Guard

string.name: d0
string.value: SnowFro the Fruitnificent appears quite often here. Please be careful.

string.name: d1
string.value: SnowFro the Fruitnificent appears quite often here. Please be careful.

string.name: n0
string.value: This is dangerous place.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please return to the temple, where it's safe.

string.name: func
string.value: The Praying Girl

string.name: d0
string.value: *Mumbles* I must do my best.

string.name: d1
string.value: *Mumbles* I must do my best.

string.name: n0
string.value: Awimoweh... Awimoweh...

string.name: n1
string.value: The legendary SnowFro has appeared...

string.name: func
string.value: General Store

string.name: d0
string.value: I used to be big-time! I was gonna be in pictures, kung-fuing all over the big screen. Now I'm stuck here...

string.name: d1
string.value: I used to be big-time! I was gonna be in pictures, kung-fuing all over the big screen. Now I'm stuck here...

string.name: n0
string.value: Coming all the way here... you are pretty impressive.

string.name: n1
string.value: Why am I here? *Chuckles* Don't worry about it.

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Yoo

string.name: func
string.value: Golden Temple Tour Guide

string.name: d0
string.value: This is now a dangerous place for traveling. It would be best if you went back.

string.name: d1
string.value: This is now a dangerous place for traveling. It would be best if you went back.

string.name: n0
string.value: Be careful, this is a dangerous place for traveling.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please hurry and prepare to leave.

string.name: name
string.value: Ms. Tang

string.name: n0
string.value: *Sigh.* It's not a good day for business.

string.name: n1
string.value: Ask me anything you'd like!

string.name: n0
string.value: Would you like to leave this place?

string.name: n1
string.value: If you would like to leave this place, talk to me.

string.name: func
string.value: Golden Temple Guard

string.name: n0
string.value: *Spark!* I am cybernetic automaton model T-1337. BZZ!

string.name: n1
string.value: I have been sent to... CRITICAL SYSTEM ERROR! *Blue Screen.*

string.name: d0
string.value: *Spark!* I am cybernetic automaton model T-1337. BZZ!

string.name: d1
string.value: I have been sent to... CRITICAL SYSTEM ERROR! *Blue Screen.*

string.name: n0
string.value: Zzz... Zzz...

string.name: n1
string.value: Can I help you?

string.name: d0
string.value: I have pride and respect. That is especially important for people like us.

string.name: d1
string.value: I have pride and respect. That is especially important for people like us.

string.name: n1
string.value: What do you think is hiding under the shadows?

string.name: d0
string.value: What brings you here?

string.name: d1
